title: Kannil Mazhai Lyrics Album Songs Sid Sriram
stanzas:
Kannil Mazhai
nenjil idi , minnal ezha 
angum ingum 
nam ninaivugal vandhaduthe.
oduthe en seivatho.

kannadi mel
kal veesinom
kaalai koorum 
or thugaladhu 
nam kadhal enraanadho.

poi aanadhe
mei aanathaal
mei aanathe
kadhalai maaithatho.

.. padam
theneer karai
nam naatkalin
chinnamaai neeluthe.
innum neela neela
kaayam aarumo.

Kannil Mazhai
nenjil idi , minnal ezha 

kaalam neram
eeram yedhum
podhaathu annaalile. 

meendum andha
naatkal ketka
vazhkai nanban illai.

valiye...
oliye...
valiyil anbe
maranam varaiyaadhe

oliye 
oliyin nizhale
oligira idam edho..

kannadi mel
kal veesinom

mei aanadhu
poi aanadho.

thoorigaigal 
saayam seyya
kaayam aarudho.

noolil aadum
bommai pola
kaadhal indru
oosal aadutho.

Kannil Mazhai
nenjil idi , minnal ezha 
angum ingum 
nam ninaivugal vandhaduthe.
oduthe en seivatho.

uraiye
uraiyin nizhalil
karaiye karaiyaathe.

mazhaiye
maraiye
maraiyin pizhaiye
maranthathum marainthatho.

Kannil Mazhai
nenjil idi , minnal ezha

seo.keywords: Albums, Subu, Prasanna B, Sid Sriram, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
